properties.entry: SELECT PAYMENT_DT, MEMBER_NM, ROOM_NO, CHECK_IN, CHECK_OUT FROM RESERVATION_CHECK JOIN RESERVATION_REQ R USING(REQUEST_NO) JOIN PAYMENT USING(PAYMENT_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE RESERVATION_FL = 'Y'

SELECT RESERVATION_NO, TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), ROOM_NO, CHECK_IN, TO_CHAR(DATE_RANGE, 'YYYY.MM.DD'), ROOM_TYPE, RESERVED_NUM_A, RESERVED_NUM_C, MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_PHONE, BIRTH_DAY, MEMBER_ADDR, EXTRA_REQUEST, ROOM_RATES, OPTION_TYPE, OPTION_COUNT, PAYMENT_AMOUNT
